pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of the Green Grove$() uses $(blood)LP$() from your Soul Network to grow plants.$(br2)Looking at a growable plant and pressing [$(k:use)] will apply the bone meal effect to the plant.$(br2)Activating the sigil cause it to consume $(blood)150 LP$() every 5 seconds and randomly apply the bone meal effect to plants
in a 7x7x5 volume centered on the player.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)150 LP$()/use$(br)$(bold)Activation:$() $(blood)150 LP$()/5 sec
